edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.utility
Interface SigmaProverInput

All Superinterfaces:
ZKProverInput
All Known Implementing Classes:
SigmaANDProverInput, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueProverInput, SigmaDHExtendedProverInput, SigmaDHProverInput, SigmaDJEncryptedValueProverInput, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroProverInput, SigmaDJProductProverInput, SigmaDlogProverInput, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverInput, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverInput, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValuePrivKeyProverInput, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueRandomnessProverInput, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyProverInput, SigmaORMultipleProverInput, SigmaORTwoProverInput, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeProverInput, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverInput
public interface SigmaProverInput
extends ZKProverInput

Every Sigma protocol prover needs inputs during the protocol execution, but every concrete prover needs different inputs.

This interface is a marker interface for Sigma protocol input, where there is an implementing class for each concrete Sigma protocol.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

          Returns the common parameters of the prover and the verifier.
